comment.body: you can hide all "hello, zerome!" in ZeroMe Reload.
@P2P: she did. the fake one was revealed last night, as well as the real one (I believe).
someone did it by the name of 'e su'. but 'e su' claimed that someone did it personally and that they did not reveal anything to the public.
it happened on telegram and I guess you don't have an account. it is a shame.
@Nekocross: yeah, I heard that. I believe esu did figure out her name long before last night, but someone else released those info using esu's name. I think the whole thing is not over yet.
